channel.title: General War Fear Bush Annoying Iran Sad on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General War Fear Bush Annoying Iran Sad on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: I am not excited for the US to attack Iran
item.description: I am not a fan of our current administration. I don’t like how they work, what they do or what they have done to our country. I haven’t voted them in. I have participated in removing them from office - without success. And now that it seems we are on the eve of an attack on Iran, i am not very happy. It is frustrating that a group of people are in power who are not listening to the world, not listening to their constituents and not listening to history.
